hackathonInfo.name: Cyfuture AI Hackathon 1.0
hackathonInfo.location: Cyfuture India Pvt Ltd, NSEZ, Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India
hackathonInfo.description: An immersive 24-hour hackathon experience to build the next generation of AI-powered solutions that will transform various industries.

problemStatement.title: Empowering Industries with AI Innovation
problemStatement.overview: In an era of rapid technological advancement, industries such as call centers, finance, healthcare, sustainability, and education face unique challenges that demand smarter, more efficient, and scalable solutions. Artificial Intelligence (AI) has the potential to revolutionize these sectors by enhancing customer experiences, optimizing operations, improving decision-making, and addressing pressing global issues. However, unlocking this potential requires creative, practical, and impactful applications tailored to real-world needs.

domains.name: Call Centers
domains.description: Improve customer service efficiency, reduce wait times, enhance agent performance, or personalize customer interactions.

domains.name: Finance
domains.description: Streamline fraud detection, optimize investment strategies, automate financial planning, or improve risk assessment.

domains.name: Healthcare
domains.description: Enhance patient care, predict disease outbreaks, optimize resource allocation, or simplify medical record management.

domains.name: Sustainability
domains.description: Tackle climate change, optimize energy consumption, reduce waste, or promote eco-friendly practices.

domains.name: Education
domains.description: Personalize learning experiences, automate administrative tasks, improve accessibility, or predict student performance.

domains.name: Other Industries
domains.description: Propose an innovative AI solution for an industry of your choice (e.g., retail, logistics, entertainment) that solves a pressing problem or creates new opportunities.

timeline.description: Registration for the Cyfuture AI Hackathon 1.0 begins. Form your teams and prepare for an exciting challenge!
Last day to register your team for the hackathon. Make sure to complete your registration before the deadline.
All teams must submit their project ideas and presentation slides for Phase 1 evaluation by this date.
Top 15 teams will be selected based on idea submissions and notified for participation in the grand finale at Cyfuture headquarters.
The 24-hour hackathon begins! Selected teams gather at Cyfuture India Pvt Ltd, NSEZ, Noida for the opening ceremony.
Teams work on their solutions for 24 hours straight. Mentors will be available to provide guidance and support.
All teams must submit their final projects, including code, documentation, and presentation materials.
Teams present their solutions to a panel of judges from Cyfuture and industry experts.
Winners will be announced and prizes will be awarded during the closing ceremony.

faq.question: Who can participate in the Cyfuture AI Hackathon?
faq.answer: The hackathon is open to students, professionals, and AI enthusiasts. Participants can form teams of 2-4 members. We welcome individuals with diverse skill sets including AI/ML, software development, UX/UI design, and business acumen.

faq.question: Is there any registration fee?
faq.answer: No, there is no registration fee to participate in the Cyfuture AI Hackathon. It's completely free to join!

faq.question: How will the top 15 teams be selected?
faq.answer: The top 15 teams will be selected based on their initial idea submission, technical feasibility, innovation potential, and relevance to the problem statement. Each submission will be reviewed by our panel of judges.

faq.question: What should we bring to the hackathon?
faq.answer: Participants should bring their own laptops, chargers, and any specific hardware they might need for their project. Food and refreshments will be provided during the event. For those participating in the grand finale at Cyfuture headquarters, accommodation arrangements will be communicated separately.

faq.question: Do we need to have a solution ready before the hackathon?
faq.answer: No, you don't need to have a ready solution before the hackathon. However, it's beneficial to brainstorm ideas and do some preliminary research on AI technologies. The actual development will happen during the 24-hour hackathon period.

faq.question: What technologies can we use for our solution?
faq.answer: You are free to use any technology stack of your choice. This includes but is not limited to AI/ML libraries, cloud services, and programming languages. We encourage innovative use of technologies to solve the problem statement.

faq.question: Will there be mentors available during the hackathon?
faq.answer: Yes, industry experts and mentors from Cyfuture and partner companies will be available throughout the hackathon to provide guidance and technical support.

faq.question: What are the judging criteria?
faq.answer: Projects will be judged based on technical implementation, innovation, relevance to the problem statement, user experience, scalability, and business potential. The presentation quality and demonstration of the working prototype will also be considered.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
items: All participants must register and agree to the hackathon rules and code of conduct.
All code developed during the hackathon must be original or properly attributed if using open-source components.
Teams retain ownership of their intellectual property but grant Cyfuture a non-exclusive license to showcase their projects.
Judges' decisions are final and cannot be appealed.
Cyfuture reserves the right to disqualify any team found to be violating the rules or code of conduct.
